ygData.msgSnippet: ... That shouldn t matter.  If you are out of his breath radius, then you are not damaging him, so time away while feared doesn t affect the balance any. Waves
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 30 Mar 2000, Jeff Heskett wrote:
>
> it's been debated and a large part of our failure may be so few people were
> feared this time. with one massive wall of people staying in naggy's breath
> radius, everyone dropped at once instead of the recurring waves you get when
> a large number are feared.

That shouldn't matter. If you are out of his breath radius,
then you are not damaging him, so time away while feared
doesn't affect the balance any.

Waves seem to work better because I suspect he slows down on
his spellcasting (possibly his breath attack too) as he gets
lower in mana. If you only have part of your group take the
brunt of the initial attack, the rest can join in later waves
when he's not doing as much AE damage.

--
